Anyhow, here is a great recipe i found for chocolate milk on steam guides:

1 tbsp of cocao powder
1 tbsp of stevia (alternative would be 1 tbsp of raw cane sugar or just sugar(probably the better option because stevia is supposedly bad GG))
1/4 tsp of vanilla extract
1/2 tbsp of peanutbutter
1 1/2 cups of milk

All you have to do is mix all of these ingredients in a blender, or shake it really good, and viola! You have some almost sugar-free, healthier, chocolate milk. This will make you feel good as you game and fuel your game! *DISCLAIMER* This is not 100% guarunteed to work, but it definitely is pretty good if you have the right taste for it!

This game is great, if you are a survivor. Playing a killer is un-fun, it feels repetitive, and 4v1, how is that even fair? I don't get why people enjoy this game. Maybe their nostalgia boner is overshadowing how awful this game is. If you want to play a killer, don't. Its frustrating.
good game exept tunneling and face campper killers
Best game for dragging down your teammates who just want to survive a brutal murder.

A lot of video games over the years have done an amazing job on story, community involvement, game play, and remodeling systems used in their game.

Behaviour Interactive absolutely kicks ass, from the snips you get from the game you can see that they love making this game and also enjoy playing it, the phrasing in the snippits you get from the devs are absolute truths, I've worked in sales and I swear these messages were not cherry picked nor edited heavily, the game play has its ups and downs but it is usually user understanding of the mechanics used, and when enough people don't get it you can tell the changes are made for both the killer and survivor to enjoy.

I would highly recommend this game to anyone who likes team work and a massive lack of pandering down to its user-base, like seriously, its one thing to whitewash a character but a entirely different to make the only shirtless character available gay. 100% nearly everything about this game cracks me up because of how many steps they take to step out in a very good way. Incredibly self aware developers. (also fashionable)

One of the best games with an absolutely horrible community. The game itself is great but all the people who play it just cry and pout about the stupidest things while hating each other. I play both killer and survivor and survivors on average are significantly more toxic and whiny. you could go into a game with the worst killer bringing no addons or perks and still get called names for winning. That being said it is still worth playing the game.

One of the best horror games on steam hands down.

Fear,anger,relief,apathy,empathy. Play the game long enough and you will experience every one of those. 

A plethora of survivors for each type of player.
Enough killers to satiate any horror film aficionado. 
Tons of perks for both survivor and killer.
Decent MMR system (still needs a bit of work).
Dedicated servers.
Constant updates and balance tuning with clear discussion from the devs.

Easily 9.5/10
